MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH62 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in The Esplanade, New Ferry Road and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown due to a fault on the underground cable. Our team will be carrying out permanent repair work on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.45pm on 30th of Dec 2020.
